name: The Waiting Room (GreenClovers)
description:
A game/visual novel made for the Scream Game Jam, with the theme of Infinity. Made in a few days by one person. I tried to go for a "Brighter" horror, but again it's mostly an AI apologizing to you. What can I say, I like AI. 

This game is made to be played once. 

CONTROLS

Use spacebar to go forward. 

Use the mouse or arrow keys to make choices in the story. 

CREDITS

BG images made in Blender

AnGel made in ArtBreeder.com

Frame made in Inkscape, wings taken from https://openclipart.org/detail/7397/wing

Audio from Ultimate SFX Bundle by Sidearm Studio

Ink used to write the story

Put together in the Godot engine.

Some image editing done with Photopea.com
